name: Oppilo
description:
HOW TO PLAY:  

Controls - mouse 1 to dash, mouse 2 to reflect.

In this endless Pong inspired high-score game you protect earth from a barrage of meteors, either by simply blocking their path or reflecting others into them! 

Compete with others using the online leaderboard and see who can hold out the longest.

Made for the 120th Mini Jam

City background - https://lucky-loops.itch.io/parallax-city-background

Music - https://wyver9.bandcamp.com/album/arcade-8-bit-loops-battletoads-style

SFX - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle-15... (currently on sale for only £10 - super highly recommended tbh)

Thumbnail - Midjourney.
